title.rendered: Air France Ticket Office in Yerevan, Armenia

content.rendered:
Air France:

Air France was founded in 7 October 1933 and has headquartered in Tremblay-en-France, (north of Paris). Air France has served 36 destinations in France and operates worldwide scheduled passenger and cargo services to 168 destinations in 93 countries (including overseas departments and territories of France) Air France has carried 46,803,000 passengers in 2015.

Air France Yerevan Ticket Office Address:
c/o Executive Travel,
Alek Manukyan 9,0070 Yerevan, Yerevan, Armenia

Air France Reservation office telephone contact numbers:
+374 60 61 22 78

Air France Call center number Armenia: +374 60 612277 / +374 60 612288

Working hours:
Monday Tuesday Wednesday Thursday Friday : 09:30-18:00,Saturday : 10:00-14:00

Air France Official website: https://airfrance.com/

Air France Customer care opening hours: 7 days a week from 7:30 AM to 10:00 PM (8:30 AM on week-ends and holidays)

Air France Customer care number: 09 69 39 01 04 / 1-800-992-3932

Air France Online Check-in: www.airfrance.com/online check-in

* Air France online check-in begins from 30 hours before the flight departure.

For Air France Airport check-in (you can check wherever airportcheck-in available at the airports located all over the world): Air France Airport check-in

Check your Air France flight status here: www.Air France.com/flightstatus

Air France Lost and Found contact phone number, address, email

ZVARTNOTS airport lost and found in Yerevan, Armenia

Opening hours (local time): 24/7

Location: Arrival zone of “Zvartnots” International Airport, in the baggage claim area opposite the conveyor belt N3

Phone: +374 10 493000 ext. 7226 or 7010 (English, Armenian)

Phone: +374 10 493 000 ext.7226 / 7010 (24 hours)
Phone: +374 93 600 566 (24 hours)

Email: lost&found@aia-zvartnots.aero

For more information, visit http://www.zvartnots.aero/en/lost-and-found

For Air France baggage inquiries : Air France baggage inquiries

Air France Damaged baggage: Damaged Baggage – Air France

Air France Baggage lost and found: Baggage lost and found – Air France

Air France Customer Care fax, address, email

Fax: +7 495 775 38 15; + 7 812 346 68 64

Address: 119049, Moscow, Mytnaya str., 1.

E-mail: mail.customercare.afkl.armenia@airfrance.fr

Types of Planes / Air craft available with Air France

Total fleet: 236

  • Airbus A318-100
  • Airbus A319-100
  • Airbus A320-200
  • Airbus A321-100
  • Airbus A321-200
  • Airbus A330-200
  • Airbus A340-300
  • Airbus A350-900
  • Airbus A380-800
  • Boeing 777-200ER
  • Boeing 777-300ER
  • Boeing 787-9
  • Boeing 777F
Queries handled by Air France Customer care:
Flight Ticket Booking, Ticket Ticket Cancellation, Flight Ticket Rescheduling, Ok to Board, Visa Services, Online Check-in, Baggage Allowance, Duty Free Allowance, Flight Information, Airport Lounges, Visa Information, In-Flight Meals, Airport Transfers, Missing Luggage, Immigration Services, Valet Parking, Meet and Greet, Flight Wifi, Airport Wifi, In-Flight Entertainment, Airport Facilities, Delayed Flights, Visa on Arrival, First Class, Business Class, Economy Class, Flying Blue

Is there any problem with reaching the Air France Yerevan Ticket Office Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Air France Yerevan Ticket Office in Armenia: (click on the stars below)
